0110000110000010 1100110100010000 1 -> sum: 0010111010010011, cout: 1
0010100101111010 0110100110100111 1 -> sum: 1001001100100010, cout: 0

1001110010011011 1011101111011000 0 -> sum: 0101100001110011, cout: 1
